forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens under a gentle shroud of partly cloudy skies, holding a comfortable chill around 55 degrees. A light southwest breeze whispers through the avenues, accentuating the calmness of the early morning. The sun, however, promises to unfurl its golden hues before long, reaching towards a pleasant 70 degrees. The day will gradually transition, nudging down to about 67 as the afternoon unfolds, with the wind strengthening slightly, bringing refreshing gusts. 

Though traces of the marine layer linger—a soft veil that caresses the tops of the hills—the clarity is steadily improving, hinting at the potential for a beautifully vibrant day. The iconic sight of the Golden Gate might still be cloaked in mist, but as the sun ascends, expect those enigmatic foggy patches to recede, unveiling the breathtaking views this city is famous for. For the discerning San Franciscan, a light sweater or a stylish jacket might be the perfect accompaniment for morning strolls or leisurely coffee outings while leaving room for a soft t-shirt or summer attire as the day heats up. With such splendid conditions, a wander along the Embarcadero or a relaxed visit to a local café to savor a pastry could serve as the ideal way to embrace the charm of this lovely day.
